pages.text: Using a ritual is a simple task, but it requires a lot of concentration and significant prices. To use a ritual, hold the ritualistic ingredients of the ritual's element on your off-hand, and in your main hand hold the cursed item. After that, hold right click and the ritual will be cast, with the cost of effort points.

To use rituals learned through paranormal powers, simply use the power.$(p)$(l)Ritualistic ingredients/$ can be made or refilled on a crafting table. It's use is discarded when you have affinity with it's element.$(br)$(l)Effort points/$ are the dots above your hunger bar. Presence increases your maximum effort.
